titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a ryght frutefull mater: and hath to name the boke of surueyeng and improume[n]tes
Book of surveying
titleStmt.author: Fitzherbert, John, d. 1531.
Fitzherbert, Anthony, Sir, 1470-1538.
Berthelet, Thomas. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete by Rycharde Pynson, printer to the kynges noble grace,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde god. M.D.xxiii. the. xv. day of Iuly. [1523]]

notesStmt.note: By John Fitzherbert. Sometimes also attributed to Sir Anthony Fitzherbert.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Woodcut illustrations on title page and m3v.
Editions with this title include commendatory verses by Thomas Berthelet.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
